conversations.english: Housekeeping. May I help you?房务管理部。我能为您服务吗？
conversations.chinese: 房务管理部。我能为您服务吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. This is room 804. I can't find my coat. I was wondering if it's in the lost and found.是的，这里是804号房。我找不到我的外套了，我想它会不会在失物招领处？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，这里是804号房。我找不到我的外套了，我想它会不会在失物招领处？

title: 我遗失了行李牌和收据

conversations.english: I'm sorry. I've lost my tags and receipt. How can I do about it?非常抱歉。我遗失了行李牌和收据，怎么办？
conversations.chinese: 非常抱歉。我遗失了行李牌和收据，怎么办？
conversations.reply_english: I see. What is your baggage? And do not remember the tag's number or color?我知道了。您的行李是什么？您记得牌子的号码或颜色吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道了。您的行李是什么？您记得牌子的号码或颜色吗？

conversations.english: Room service.May I come in?客房服务。我能进来吗？
conversations.chinese: 客房服务。我能进来吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes．please.请进。
conversations.reply_chinese: 请进。

conversations.english: Good afternoon,sir.What Can I do for you?下午好，先生。有什么需要帮忙的吗？
conversations.chinese: 下午好，先生。有什么需要帮忙的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well.I can't find my key now. I think I have lost it.我想我可能把钥匙丢了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想我可能把钥匙丢了。

conversations.english: What can I do for you?有什么需要帮忙的吗?
conversations.chinese: 有什么需要帮忙的吗?
conversations.reply_english: I'd like to be waken up tomorrow morning.我明天早上需要一个叫醒服务。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我明天早上需要一个叫醒服务。

conversations.english: Housekeeping, may I come in?客房部的,我能进来吗？
conversations.chinese: 客房部的,我能进来吗？
conversations.reply_english: Come in please.请进。
conversations.reply_chinese: 请进。

title: 你能帮我们买点水果吗

conversations.english: Excuse me,could you do me a favor?打扰一下，能帮我个忙吗？
conversations.chinese: 打扰一下，能帮我个忙吗？
conversations.reply_english: Of couse, what's the matter?当然，什么事？
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，什么事？

conversations.english: Good evening, sir. What can I do for you?晚上好，先生，我能帮您忙吗？
conversations.chinese: 晚上好，先生，我能帮您忙吗？
conversations.reply_english: We are going to have a party tonight, would you please look after our baby tonight?我们晚上要参加个聚会，你能帮我们照看孩子吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们晚上要参加个聚会，你能帮我们照看孩子吗？

conversations.english: Room service.What can I do for you?客房部。我能帮您忙吗？
conversations.chinese: 客房部。我能帮您忙吗？
conversations.reply_english: I find the sheet in my room is so stained.Would you please help us change it for a clean one?我的床单太脏了。能帮我换一床干净的吗?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我的床单太脏了。能帮我换一床干净的吗?

title: 我打电话来取消旅馆预约

conversations.english: Good afternoon, Peace Hotel, what can I do for you?下午好，这里是和平旅馆。我能帮您吗？
conversations.chinese: 下午好，这里是和平旅馆。我能帮您吗？
conversations.reply_english: I have made a reservation for this Sunday. My name is Bobby我已经预订了间周日的房间，我叫伯比。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我已经预订了间周日的房间，我叫伯比。

conversations.english: Welcome to our hotel's indoor swimming pool. What can I do for you?欢迎来到本酒店的室内游泳池。请问有什么可以帮您的？
conversations.chinese: 欢迎来到本酒店的室内游泳池。请问有什么可以帮您的？
conversations.reply_english: You see this is the first time for me to use the swimming pool. I've got no idea about the water temperature of the pool. I'm afraid it might be a little cold.这是我第一次来游泳池，我不知道水温是多少，我恐怕会有一点儿冷。
conversations.reply_chinese: 这是我第一次来游泳池，我不知道水温是多少，我恐怕会有一点儿冷。

conversations.english: Good morning, sir. Here is the hotel's sauna room. What can I do for you?早上好，先生。这是我们酒店的桑拿房。我能为您做些什么？
conversations.chinese: 早上好，先生。这是我们酒店的桑拿房。我能为您做些什么？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. This is the first time I've come here. Could you please tell me something about it?是的，我是第一次来这早。请给我介绍一下好吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我是第一次来这早。请给我介绍一下好吗？

conversations.english: Good evening.晚上好。
conversations.chinese: 晚上好。
conversations.reply_english: Good evening. My wife and I would like a room,please. Is there any room available? We don't have a reservation.晚上好。我和我的妻子想要一间房间。有空房吗？我们没有预订。
conversations.reply_chinese: 晚上好。我和我的妻子想要一间房间。有空房吗？我们没有预订。

conversations.english: Good moming.早上好。
conversations.chinese: 早上好。
conversations.reply_english: Good moming. Are you through with the cleaning ?If not, we'll come back a little later.早上好。你们的房间打扫完了吗？如果没有，我们一会儿就过来。
conversations.reply_chinese: 早上好。你们的房间打扫完了吗？如果没有，我们一会儿就过来。

conversations.english: Good evening.晚上好
conversations.chinese: 晚上好
conversations.reply_english: Good evening. Could you let us have a double room？晚上好！有双人房吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 晚上好！有双人房吗？

conversations.english: Here we are at the hotel.我们到旅馆了
conversations.chinese: 我们到旅馆了
conversations.reply_english: Thank you very much for coming to meet me, Mr.Smith.非常感谢你来接我，史密斯先生
conversations.reply_chinese: 非常感谢你来接我，史密斯先生

title: 能给我送份收视指南吗

conversations.english: Hello. This is the front desk. What can I do for you?您好。这是前台。我能为您做什么？
conversations.chinese: 您好。这是前台。我能为您做什么？
conversations.reply_english: Hi. I’m calling from Room 209. I couldn’t find the TV Guide. Can you send me one, please?您好。我是209室的。我找不到收视指南了。能给我送一份吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 您好。我是209室的。我找不到收视指南了。能给我送一份吗？

conversations.english: Hello. Front desk.您好。这是前台。
conversations.chinese: 您好。这是前台。
conversations.reply_english: Yes. This is Bob Robinson. I’m calling from room number 627.我是627房间的Bob Robinson。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我是627房间的Bob Robinson。

conversations.english: Room service, can I help you?客房服务。有什么能帮您的吗？
conversations.chinese: 客房服务。有什么能帮您的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. This is Barbara in room 209. I’d like to order breakfast, please.是的。我是209房的Barbara。我想要订份早餐。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。我是209房的Barbara。我想要订份早餐。

conversations.english: Hello, room service. Can I help you?您好，客房服务。有什么能帮您的吗？
conversations.chinese: 您好，客房服务。有什么能帮您的吗？
conversations.reply_english: I ordered dinner about forty minutes ago. It hasn’t been delivery yet.我40分钟前订了晚餐，可是现在还没有送来。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我40分钟前订了晚餐，可是现在还没有送来。

conversations.english: Did you ask them to send more blankets up?These blankets they use are too thin.你有叫他们多送一些毯子上来吗？这些毯子太薄了。
conversations.chinese: 你有叫他们多送一些毯子上来吗？这些毯子太薄了。
conversations.reply_english: No, I didn't think of it.我没想到。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我没想到。

title: 我把钥匙留在房间里了

conversations.english: I can't get into my room.I mean I left my room key inside.我进不了房间了，我的意思是我把钥匙留在房内了。
conversations.chinese: 我进不了房间了，我的意思是我把钥匙留在房内了。
conversations.reply_english: I see,sir.Those two ladies in front of your room did the same thing twenty minutes ago.我知道，先生。你房间前面的那两位女士在20分钟前发生同样的情形。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道，先生。你房间前面的那两位女士在20分钟前发生同样的情形。

conversations.english: Well,we didn't ask for this room service.It must be somebody else's,I'm sure.哦，我们没有要求过住房服务，我相信一定是其他人要求的。
conversations.chinese: 哦，我们没有要求过住房服务，我相信一定是其他人要求的。
conversations.reply_english: Oh,is it?Let me check.啊，是吗？让我查一下。
conversations.reply_chinese: 啊，是吗？让我查一下。

conversations.english: Can I help you,ma'am.我能为你效劳吗？夫人。
conversations.chinese: 我能为你效劳吗？夫人。
conversations.reply_english: Yes,will you keep our bags until 6 p.m.?是的，请你替我们保管袋子到6点钟好吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，请你替我们保管袋子到6点钟好吗？

conversations.english: Well,we've been waiting for our baggage for about one hour.哦，我们等行李已经等了一个小时了。
conversations.chinese: 哦，我们等行李已经等了一个小时了。
conversations.reply_english: What kind of bag is it?它是什么类型的袋子呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 它是什么类型的袋子呢？

conversations.english: Excuse me, Sir, you are not supposed to smoke here.先生，很抱歉，您不应该在这里吸烟。
conversations.chinese: 先生，很抱歉，您不应该在这里吸烟。
conversations.reply_english: I beg your pardon.请原谅。
conversations.reply_chinese: 请原谅。

conversations.english: So I'm on the fifth floor?How come this hotel has no fourth floor.所以我在五楼?这间饭店怎么没有四楼?
conversations.chinese: 所以我在五楼?这间饭店怎么没有四楼?
conversations.reply_english: Four is an unlucky number here,Peter.Four sounds like death in Chinese.Hotels often have no fourth floor."四"是不吉利的数字,Peter."四"在中文听起来像"死".这里的饭店常常没有四楼.
conversations.reply_chinese: "四"是不吉利的数字,Peter."四"在中文听起来像"死".这里的饭店常常没有四楼.

conversations.english: I am sorry to trouble you,but there's a lot of noise in the next room.抱歉，打扰你了，但隔壁房间噪音很大。
conversations.chinese: 抱歉，打扰你了，但隔壁房间噪音很大。
conversations.reply_english: Oh,is there?Which room is it?啊，有吗？是哪一个房间呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 啊，有吗？是哪一个房间呢？

conversations.english: PomPous. How may I help you?这里是PomPous。我可以帮你吗？
conversations.chinese: 这里是PomPous。我可以帮你吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I'd like to reserve a table for dinner.是的，我想预订晚餐的位子。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我想预订晚餐的位子。

title: 请代保管行李直到我离开

conversations.english: Can I help you, madam？能为你效劳吗，夫人？
conversations.chinese: 能为你效劳吗，夫人？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, would you keep our bags until 6pm.是的，请你替我们保管袋子到6点钟好吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，请你替我们保管袋子到6点钟好吗？

conversations.english: Room service. Can I help you?送餐部，能为你做点什么吗？
conversations.chinese: 送餐部，能为你做点什么吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,tomorrow is my friend's birthday.Could I arrange a birthday party for him through you?明天是我朋友的生日，可以通过您为他安排生日晚会吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 明天是我朋友的生日，可以通过您为他安排生日晚会吗？

title: 我可以借用夹克和领带吗

conversations.english: Well, sir. We are asking all our guests to wear a jacket and a tie in our restaurant.哦，先生，我们的餐厅是要求所有的宾客都穿夹克和打领带的。
conversations.chinese: 哦，先生，我们的餐厅是要求所有的宾客都穿夹克和打领带的。
conversations.reply_english: Is that so? I didn't know it. can I possibly borrow a jacket and a tie?是那样吗？我不知道，我可以借用一件夹克和领带吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是那样吗？我不知道，我可以借用一件夹克和领带吗？

conversations.english: I'm now on the Songshan airport getting ready for departure. I realized that I might have left my watch.我现在是在松山机场，正准备离境，我想我可能掉了我的表了。
conversations.chinese: 我现在是在松山机场，正准备离境，我想我可能掉了我的表了。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, Ma'am. May I have your name and room number?是的，夫人。请问你的姓名和住房号码是什么？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，夫人。请问你的姓名和住房号码是什么？

conversations.english: Good afternoon. Lotus Catering Company. Lilian speaking. May I help you?下午好。荷花餐饮公司。我是丽莲。能帮忙吗？
conversations.chinese: 下午好。荷花餐饮公司。我是丽莲。能帮忙吗？
conversations.reply_english: Good afternoon. Lilian. This is Tom Baker over at Beck’s Trading company. We need to arrange a banquet for next Wednesday afternoon.下午好，丽莲。我是伯克贸易公司的汤姆·贝克。我们要订一个下周三下午的宴会。
conversations.reply_chinese: 下午好，丽莲。我是伯克贸易公司的汤姆·贝克。我们要订一个下周三下午的宴会。

conversations.english: Hi, is this the Bread and Cheese Deli?你好，是面包奶酪送餐服务吗？
conversations.chinese: 你好，是面包奶酪送餐服务吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, ma’am. How may I help you?是的，夫人。您需要什么？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，夫人。您需要什么？
